Jojoba Oil - Golden - 8 oz, Safety sealed container, Soap making, lotion, creams, massage oil, bath, beauty, lip balm
Traverse Bay Soap Company
['Jojoba Oil - Golden - 8oz- Jojoba Oil is a light oil and is great for people with sensitive skin. It works well as a skin moisturizer as well as a hair conditioner. Jojoba Oil helps to relieve dry and cracked skin, as well as reducing dandruff. We share our commitment with our producers/manufacturers to source only the highest quality ingredients, using fair-trade farming practices as well as organically grown crops. Water and oil resistant labelling, so you will always know what’s in your bottle. All of our oils are sold by weight not volume. All are weighed on digital scales, by hand. Oils vary widely in density. So oil levels in bottles vary depending on oil. Most soap and personal care product recipes are measured by weight not volume. MPORTANT:\xa0All Traverse Bay Bath And Body products are for external use only unless otherwise indicated. This information is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease, and it should not be used by anyone who is pregnant or under the care of a medical practitioner. Essential Oils must be properly diluted before use in order to avoid any damages to property or adverse physical effects (including injury or bodily harm)']

True by Made Beautiful Hydrating Hair Butter 12oz
Made Beautiful
['True by Made Beautiful Hydrating Hair Butter (12oz) defines hair while providing intense moisture and controlling frizz. This nourishing styling butter features a unique blend of honey and mango to provide ultimate moisture as well as shea butter and coconut that penetrates hair to nourish from cuticle to root. True Hydrating Hair Butter is a must have for twisting, Bantu knots, braiding or simply defining your curl pattern. True Hydrating Hair Butter is sulfate-free and paraben-free.']
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.6 x 3.6 x 2.7 inches; 12 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8.52788E+11', 'UPC': '852788006503', 'Manufacturer': 'MADE BEAUTIFUL'}
I bought this with other products from the same line and I love the other products but I felt like this hair butter dried my hair out a little , but it does smell amazing.
